variables.description: The percentage of CPU utilization that triggers the starting or stopping of                   instances (scaling).
variables.name: CpuThreshold

variables.description: The amount of time (in minutes) after a scaling event occurs that AWS OpsWorks should                   ignore metrics and not start any additional scaling events.
variables.name: IgnoreMetricsTime

variables.description: The number of instances to add or remove when the load exceeds a                   threshold.
variables.name: InstanceCount

variables.description: The degree of system load that triggers the starting or stopping of instances                   (scaling). For more information about how load is computed, see Load                      (computing).
variables.name: LoadThreshold

variables.description: The percentage of memory consumption that triggers the starting or stopping of                   instances (scaling).
variables.name: MemoryThreshold

variables.description: The amount of time, in minutes, that the load must exceed a threshold before                   instances are added or removed.
variables.name: ThresholdsWaitTime
